knit flat size 0-6 months 6-12 months materials less than 1 ball of elina gauge 20 sts =4 over st st get gauge needles size us 5 & us 7 abbreviations k = knit p = purl k2tog = knit 2 sts together p2tog = purl 2 sts together st s = stitch es rs = right side ws = wrong side st st = stockinette st p l y m o u t h y a r n® b220 free pattern with our compliments find inspiration www plymouthyarn com 1x1 ribbing flat row 1 rs * p1 k1 repeat from * to last st end p1 row 2 ws * k1 p1 repeat from * to last st end k1 with smaller needles loosely cast on 67 73 sts work row 1 & 2 of ribbing for a total of 6 row change to larger needles and begin working in st st until total length is 4 5 5 5 ending with a ws row on the next row begin decreasing as follows on row 5 for smallest size row 1 for larger size row 1 * knit 6 k2tog repeat from * to last st end k1 row 2 purl row 3 * knit 5 k2tog repeat from * to last st end k1 row 4 purl row 5 * knit 4 k2tog repeat from * to last st end k1 row 6 p1 * p2tog purl 3 repeat from * to end of row row 7 * knit 2 k2tog repeat from * to last
